name: DUEL42
description:
DUEL42 is about two men fight­ing a gen­tle­man like duel on screen while the player's hands engage in a wrestling match to press the right keys.

The game is played on one key­board. The two play­ers have to move their avatars five steps away from each other, turn around, lower their arm and shoot by press­ing ran­domly assigned keys. The quick­est and most stub­born wins.

May hon­our be restored… or whatever!
